name: OCKContactViewSynchronizerProtocol
desc: A protocol that makes and updates views in a view synchronizer for contacts.

items.name: func makeView() -> Self.View
items.desc: Creates a view to be synchronized.

items.name: func updateView(Self.View, context: OCKSynchronizationContext<OCKAnyContact?>)
items.desc: Updates a view using a specific context
